Candidates should have 5 - 8 years of experience working in at least one of the core areas with experience in one of the supplementary areas being desirable. Field specific, external accreditation with an appropriate body is desirable.Core Areas:— Defined and/or implemented data governance strategy and processes including the definition of data standards— Defined and/or implemented data management approaches. Including but not limited to the selection of appropriate technology solutions, definition and running of data management processes and definition and maintenance of data quality standards— Defined and/or implemented a data or information strategy for an organisationSupplementary areas:— Built or assessed organisations against data maturity models or frameworks— Led projects which focused on data quality or data migration activities— Defined and implemented Business Intelligence or reporting strategies— Appreciation of reporting, modelling and other data technologies— Designing and querying relational databases, including ETL and SQL development— Data visualisation tools and techniquesIn addition candidates must be able to demonstrate a number, if not all, of the following:— Proven experience of working in an analytics business partnering environment, preferably in a professional services / consulting environment— Experience of leading and delivering data projects for clients, including the experience of leading and managing teams— Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including technical writing skills and the ability to explain complex technical analysis to a non-technical audience— The ability to manage time and work independently with multiple stakeholders— A desire to understand business problems and to evaluate the results of your work in a business context— Proven experience of helping clients with complex issues and dealing with the uncertainty that can arise in project situations, including having a tenacious problem solving and can-do attitude;— Entrepreneurial and a commercial mind-set;— High degree of personal motivation, ability to self-manage whilst being professional and personable— Proficient in Thai and English languageKPMG Phoomchai Audit Ltd.Human Resources Department Empire Tower50th Floor1South Sathorn Rd.,Yannawa, Sathorn Bangkok10120Contact person:Kulthida Y.Tel:02 677 2000

job_responsibilities: ['This is your opportunity to join KPMG’s Forensic team. You will gain exposure to exciting projects which will develop your skills in financial analysis, accounting and business processes, along with your knowledge of different industries and regulations while assisting our clients in Thailand and the region to solve their unplanned circumstances.KPMG Forensic offers a variety of forensic accounting and forensic technology services to assist clients in: effectively managing their exposure to risks, proactively managing their compliance with emerging requirements, resolving disputes with their business partners, understanding their control weaknesses, investigating complex matters and safeguarding their assets and reputations. We provide independent, insightful analysis, together with credible solutions by applying accounting, financial, technology and other specialized skills to help solve our client’s most difficult business challenges.Responsibilities:Analyze financial information, operational processes and accounting transactions to identify unusual transactions or weaknesses in business processes Analyze digital information and system data, understand the issuesEvaluate internal control structures and data to help identify weaknesses and associated risks; make recommendations on how to mitigate those risks Develop reports that highlight our findings in a clear, logical and concise mannerAssist clients to investigate alleged breaches of bribery or corruption regulationsInteract with clients and other external sources for the purpose of obtaining relevant information and documents']
job_qualifications: ['s and Skills:Experience with one of the following: a public accounting firm, advisory firm,internal audit function of a major company or corporate finance function of a financial institution. Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or similar discipline.CPA, CFE or CIA is an advantage.Ability to work independently, exercise good judgment and quickly adapt to new situations and solve problems.Strong analytical, research, statistical sampling, and quantitative abilitiesKnowledge and understanding of business processes and the regulatory environmentProficiency in spoken and written English and Thai.Attractive remuneration package and fringe benefits will be offered to the right candidates. Please submit resume stating qualifications and experience, present and expected salary, telephone number, together with a recent photo.KPMG Phoomchai Audit Ltd.Human Resources Department Empire Tower49th Floor 195 South Sathorn Rd.,Yannawa, SathornBangkok 10120Contact person:Kulthida Y.Tel : 02-677-2000 ext.2048 ']
job_description: This is your opportunity to join KPMG’s Forensic team. You will gain exposure to exciting projects which will develop your skills in financial analysis, accounting and business processes, along with your knowledge of different industries and regulations while assisting our clients in Thailand and the region to solve their unplanned circumstances.KPMG Forensic offers a variety of forensic accounting and forensic technology services to assist clients in: effectively managing their exposure to risks, proactively managing their compliance with emerging requirements, resolving disputes with their business partners, understanding their control weaknesses, investigating complex matters and safeguarding their assets and reputations. We provide independent, insightful analysis, together with credible solutions by applying accounting, financial, technology and other specialized skills to help solve our client’s most difficult business challenges.Responsibilities:Analyze financial information, operational processes and accounting transactions to identify unusual transactions or weaknesses in business processes Analyze digital information and system data, understand the issuesEvaluate internal control structures and data to help identify weaknesses and associated risks; make recommendations on how to mitigate those risks Develop reports that highlight our findings in a clear, logical and concise mannerAssist clients to investigate alleged breaches of bribery or corruption regulationsInteract with clients and other external sources for the purpose of obtaining relevant information and documentsQualifications and Skills:Experience with one of the following: a public accounting firm, advisory firm,internal audit function of a major company or corporate finance function of a financial institution. Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or similar discipline.CPA, CFE or CIA is an advantage.Ability to work independently, exercise good judgment and quickly adapt to new situations and solve problems.Strong analytical, research, statistical sampling, and quantitative abilitiesKnowledge and understanding of business processes and the regulatory environmentProficiency in spoken and written English and Thai.Attractive remuneration package and fringe benefits will be offered to the right candidates. Please submit resume stating qualifications and experience, present and expected salary, telephone number, together with a recent photo.KPMG Phoomchai Audit Ltd.Human Resources Department Empire Tower49th Floor 195 South Sathorn Rd.,Yannawa, SathornBangkok 10120Contact person:Kulthida Y.Tel : 02-677-2000 ext.2048

job_responsibilities: ['Team DescriptionIsn’t it fun to work in a team that we can turn data insights into actions? Our young team is full of passionate members who believe in DATA. We come together to start up something new; we work together like a family to help each other; we union together to be stronger and grow faster. By leveraging the cutting-edge technology, we utilise the best data in local market to make sure your work has value and we add value to your career. Still curious? Come to talk to us!Job SummaryOur Data Engineer needs to work on a wide scope of tasks related with data like traditional data engineers. But more importantly, we are looking for the real engineer who can solve data and business challenges to enable us scale up.ResponsibilitiesSolution and Technology EnablerStay abreast of emerging technologies, open source projects and best practices in the fieldPropose fundamental data tools development or enhancement requirementsApply broad knowledge to design data systems that meet business needsDesign and build data products and analytics applicationsBe keen on understanding areas of business, analytics and mobile applicationsData Management and WarehousingCommunicate with system developers to design data collection and modelling strategyMaintain and improve data warehouse architecture and big data platformBuild, automate and maintain real-time and batch data ingestion and transformation ELT pipelineMonitor and improve metadata, data quality and data governanceConnect with data analysts and scientists to transform data to actionable insights, features and models']
job_qualifications: [':Essential skills:Fresh graduate with relevant academic backgrounds is welcome to apply, 1-year relevant work-experience as a data engineer is preferredDeep knowledge of relational and non-relational database; Hands on experience in data warehouse Understanding of Hadoop ecosystem such as HIVE, HDFS, HBASE, YARN, Spark, Kafka, FlinkExperience with data pipeline and workflow tools such as Talend, Azkaban, AirflowExperience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Kibana, GrafanaGood coding skill in at least one of Python, Java, Scala, shell scripting and/or similar languagesFamiliar with APIs, JSON, REST and other relevant W3C open standardsProficient in English Essential attributes:Can-do attitude and excited to learn new technologiesOpen-minded and able to communicate your ideas effectivelyWork-smart and Problem-solving mindset Start-up working spirit and Agile     Please note that we will get in touch with shortlisted candidates only. ']
job_description: Team DescriptionIsn’t it fun to work in a team that we can turn data insights into actions? Our young team is full of passionate members who believe in DATA. We come together to start up something new; we work together like a family to help each other; we union together to be stronger and grow faster. By leveraging the cutting-edge technology, we utilise the best data in local market to make sure your work has value and we add value to your career. Still curious? Come to talk to us!Job SummaryOur Data Engineer needs to work on a wide scope of tasks related with data like traditional data engineers. But more importantly, we are looking for the real engineer who can solve data and business challenges to enable us scale up.ResponsibilitiesSolution and Technology EnablerStay abreast of emerging technologies, open source projects and best practices in the fieldPropose fundamental data tools development or enhancement requirementsApply broad knowledge to design data systems that meet business needsDesign and build data products and analytics applicationsBe keen on understanding areas of business, analytics and mobile applicationsData Management and WarehousingCommunicate with system developers to design data collection and modelling strategyMaintain and improve data warehouse architecture and big data platformBuild, automate and maintain real-time and batch data ingestion and transformation ELT pipelineMonitor and improve metadata, data quality and data governanceConnect with data analysts and scientists to transform data to actionable insights, features and modelsQualification:Essential skills:Fresh graduate with relevant academic backgrounds is welcome to apply, 1-year relevant work-experience as a data engineer is preferredDeep knowledge of relational and non-relational database; Hands on experience in data warehouse Understanding of Hadoop ecosystem such as HIVE, HDFS, HBASE, YARN, Spark, Kafka, FlinkExperience with data pipeline and workflow tools such as Talend, Azkaban, AirflowExperience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Kibana, GrafanaGood coding skill in at least one of Python, Java, Scala, shell scripting and/or similar languagesFamiliar with APIs, JSON, REST and other relevant W3C open standardsProficient in English Essential attributes:Can-do attitude and excited to learn new technologiesOpen-minded and able to communicate your ideas effectivelyWork-smart and Problem-solving mindset Start-up working spirit and Agile     Please note that we will get in touch with shortlisted candidates only.

Come to talk to us!Job SummaryOur Data Engineer needs to work on a wide scope of tasks related with data like traditional data engineers. But more importantly, we are looking for the real engineer who can solve data and business challenges to enable us scale up.ResponsibilitiesSolution and Technology EnablerStay abreast of emerging technologies, open source projects and best practices in the fieldPropose fundamental data tools development or enhancement requirementsApply broad knowledge to design data systems that meet business needsDesign and build data products and analytics applicationsBe keen on understanding areas of business, analytics and mobile applicationsData Management and WarehousingCommunicate with system developers to design data collection and modelling strategyMaintain and improve data warehouse architecture and big data platformBuild, automate and maintain real-time and batch data ingestion and transformation ELT pipelineMonitor and improve metadata, data quality and data governanceConnect with data analysts and scientists to transform data to actionable insights, features and modelsQualification:Essential skills:Minimum of 3-5 year relevant work-experience as a data engineerTechnical Expertise in data warehouse, data model design, data integration;Deep knowledge of relational and non-relational databaseUnderstand data governance practices and processHands on experience with data tools like Hadoop, Apache, RapidMiner, MongoDB, Neo4J    Please note that we will get in touch with shortlisted candidates only.

job_responsibilities: ['Company:CPF IT CenterCPF IT Center was founded in 2002 as a subsidiary of CPF.Its major responsibility is to provide information technology services to companies within the CPF Group.Position:Business Intelligence Developer /Data EngineerSuccessful candidates will join CPF ITs Big Data and Analytics team to provide business intelligence and data analytics solutions to domestic and overseas business units in CPF, including retail channels(CP Freshmart, Chester, etc.), Farms and Feed.Responsibilities:Develop BI and analyticsapplications (ETL/ELT, Enterprise Data Warehouse, Data Lake, Dashboard /Reports, analytics)based on given software requirements, following teamguidelines and programming conventionsUnit test developed applicationsSolve issues such as software bugs, or configuration problemsInteract with implementers and users to gather or clarify business requirementsInterpret business requirements to software requirementPrepare application usage guidelines and communicate with usersInnovate or apply IT knowledge to increase the efficiency of the task or reduce cost to maximize profit']

job_title: Data and Business Intelligence Manager, Lazada eLogistics
job_description: Reporting to the local Head of Tech and Program, responsibilities will be as follows:Quickly gain a deep understanding of the business processes that are underpinning the metrics and goals and perform deep dive analysis on the data.Design, develop and deliver end-to-end Business Intelligence projects from data extraction layer to presentation dashboard and on-demand reportsTranslate complex data and information into easy to understand insights tailored for all relevant audiencesWork efficiently with diverse business function units in logisticsperspectiveTrain business users across the venture in using data analysis and visualization tools whenrequiredSupport the Management in its day to day work delivering data driven insights and convincing presentationsProblem solving to define and drive ways to automate and optimize key processes that the data has surfaced as relevantBe the PIC (Person In Charge) for TH venture for the communication and launch of any new feature or initiative by the Regional Data & BI teamSupervise and manage the local Data & BI teamIn order to succeed in the role, you should ideally have:Excellent knowledge of relational databases (such as MySQL, PostgreSQL)Expert level in data warehouse modelling and BI tools.Mastery of other web technologies like PHP, HTML, CSS is a plus.Expert level in SQL, Python is a plusCapable of writing queries directly on the data servers provided to extract ad-hoc analysis for thebusinessAt least 5 years of experience in leading a team of subordinatesDemonstrated ability to provide guidance and groom a teamSignificant experience in E-commerce business will be much appreciatedAbility to build trust and strong professional relationship with all functions and at all levelsFull professional proficiency in EnglishHas this role caught your interest? Apply Now!!

รายละเอียดของงาน :Senior Developer  (ด่วน !!)มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการพัฒนา Software ด้วยหลักการ Algorithm, Validation, และ Debugging Concept ด้วย C# .Netมีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้ Programming Tool Visual Studioสามาถทำความเข้าใจระบบที่ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ได้ออกแบบไว้ช่วยเหลือ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ในการจัดทำเอกสาร Application Specทำความเข้าใจกับ Application Spec จาก Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc)ออกแบบ Technical Function ประสานงาน/ แสดงผลงาน/ รายงานสถานะความคืบหน้าของงาน ต่อหัวหน้าทีมที่รับผิดชอบให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการพัฒนา Softwareทำเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการพัฒนา ดูแล และควบคุมทีมงาน ให้ผลิตผลงานที่ถูกต้อง ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้เป็นที่ปรึกษาการทำงานให้กับทีมงาน ดูแล และจัดการ Resource ที่มี ให้ทำงานที่เหมาะสม และ ทำงานร่วมกันได้อย่างราบรื่น รวมทั้งลดความขัดแย้งที่เกิดขึ้นภายในทีมงานให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการทำงานแบบ Leaderคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครงาน :อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปี จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโทสาขาComputer Science, Computer Engineering, IT, MIS,Business Computer หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# อย่างน้อย 2 ปีมีความรู้ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# ระดับดีมีประสบการณ์การทำงานกับ IIS Serverมีความรู้และประสบการณ์การทำงาน ระบบฐานข้อมูล SQL Server และคำสั่ง SQL Statement, Store Procedure ระดับพื้นฐานมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Site Responsive, HTML & CSS, JQuery; JavaScript; AJAX; jSon;มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Service - SOAP and RESTมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนาระบบ (Develop and Program) ในเชิงสถาปัตยกรรม N-Tiers (PT - MT - DT) ระดับดีสามารถวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของลูกค้า และออกแบบโปรแกรมได้ตามหลัก OOP (Object Oriented Programming) ระดับดีมีความรู้และประสบการณ์จัดการ Source Control และ Deploy Applicationมีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application ด้วย Xamarin จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีความสามารถและประสบการณ์ในการควบคุมงานของตนเองและทีมงาน ให้ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้สามารถจัดการ, แก้ไขปัญหาของงาน และทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ปรับตัวเพื่อการทำงานร่วมกับทีมงานได้เป็นอย่างดี และช่วยเหลือ แบ่งปัน เพื่อบรรลุจุดมุ่งหมายร่วมกันเปิดใจรับฟังความคิดใหม่ๆ และ มีความเพียรพยายามในการทำงานให้สำเร็จสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : จังหวัด กรุงเทพมหานครอัตราที่รับเพิ่ม 4 ตำแหน่งเงินเดือน40,000 - 70,000 บาทสวัสดิการประกันสังคม ประกันชีวิต, ประกันอุบัติเหตุ, ประกันสุขภาพสิทธิการเบิกค่าทันตกรรม ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วัน มีเวลาการทำงานที่ยืดหยุ่น ค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา ค่าใช้จ่ายในการเดินทาง, ค่ายานพาหนะ ค่าตอบแทนพิเศษ เงินโบนัสตามผลงาน วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี ท่องเที่ยวประจำ วิธีการสมัครส่งใบสมัครงานผ่านปุ่ม APPLY NOW หรือ ผ่านปุ่มสมัครงานของ JobsDBติดต่อวันทำงาน จันทร์ - ศุกร์ เวลา 09.00 - 18.00 น. ฝ่ายบริหารทรัพยากรบุคคลProsperSof Consulting Co., Ltd.แผนที่บริษัท31 Phayathai Building, 5th Floor, Room 515,Phayathai Road, Thanonphayathai,Ratchathewi, Bangkok 10400Tel. 0-2126-6898Fax. 0-2619-04940www.prospersof.com--------------------------------------------------------------------------------การเดินทางรถเมล์ประจำทางสาย 2, 16, 23, 29, 34, 36, 38, 50, 54, 59, 62, 99, 140, 163ปอ. 11, 12, 16, 23, 29, 34, 36, 38, 39, 50, 59, 60, 62, 79, 99, 139, 140, ปอ.พ.12สถานีรถไฟฟ้า BTS อนุสาวรีย์ชัยสมรภูมิออกช่อง 2 ลงบันไดด้านซ้ายมือจะพบ Century movie plaza เดินตรงไปข้ามซอยรางน้ำ ถัดไปซ้ายมือจะผ่านร้าน Eat Am Are steak และปลาทองหมูกะทะ และคอนโด M Phyathai ตามลำดับ จากนั้นด้านซ้ายมือคุณจะพบป้ายสีทองใหญ่ Phyathai Building เดินเข้าไปจะพบลานจอดรถและอาคารพญไทแล้วให้ขึ้นมาที่ชั้น 5 ห้อง 515 ซึ่งอยู่ด้านซ้ายมือของลิฟท์

An excellent new opportunity has become available for a Full-stack Developer to join our Development team. data.MMTh is currently conducting several trial for above, and from next year will start to put into practice of various solutions into our actual business.To drive this initiative, MMTh has decided to form new organization and recruit specialist as leader of this.ResponsibilitiesLead entire CX project activities as leader, including digital solution planning to contribute business and digital solution implementation to actual operation, with relevant business divisionDefine customer segment and optimized promotion on it, with marketing teamMonitor business impact of each digital solution, and improvement continuouslyDesign analytics / dashboard model to contribute business, and develop analytics tools (with team members)Design and develop integrated customer data platform to enable required data analytics, digital marketing (with team members)Manage each CX project, and team resources']

Job DescriptionWe are looking for an senior Android developer responsible for the development and design of Android applications. Your primary focus will be development of Android applications, SDK to support other applications, and integration with back-end services. You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products is essential.ResponsibilityDesign and develop applications for the Android platformContribute to all aspects of the software development lifecycleParticipate in Agile/Scrum software development processCollaborate with teams to analyse, design, and ship new featuresFix software defects and improve applications performanceImplement unit and automatin test, security best practice, and API integrations in the applicationsContinuously learn and implement new technologies to maximise application performanceSkillsProficient with Kotlin, Java, and Android SDKExperience with RxJava2, Retrofit2, OkHttp3,Experience with Reactive programmingProficient understanding of design pattern such as MVP ,MVVM patternFamiliar with CICD process, Jenkins, and FastlaneExperience with unit and espresso automate testKnowledge of analytics tools such as Firebase, Google Analytic, Crashlytics.Experience with code versioning tools such as Git, SourceTree

job_description: คุณสมบัติเพศชาย / หญิง อายุ22-40 ปีวุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขานิเทศศาสตร์ สาขาสื่อดิจิทัล สาขาการสร้างสรรค์และออกแบบสื่อ สาขาการออกแบบสื่อออนไลน์ สาขาเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ และสาขาอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความรู้ความสามารถทางด้านไอที และมีความรู้ความเข้าใจในการใช้สื่อแบบออนไลน์เป็นอย่างดีมีทักษะการวิเคราะห์ การติดตามงาน สามารถติดต่อสื่อสารได้ดี และสามารถทำงานอย่างเป็นระบบมีความคิดสร้างสรรค์ และมีไอเดียในการสร้างสรรค์สื่อออนไลน์หากมีประสบการณ์ทางด้านการจัดการด้านสื่อออนไลน์จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษลักษณะงานรับผิดชอบและดูแลสื่อสังคมออนไลน์ของบริษัทจัดทำและวางแผนกลยุทธ์สื่อสังคมออนไลน์ของบริษัทรับผิดชอบและประสานงานด้านการสื่อสารงานบนสังคมออนไลน์วางแผนเลือกสื่อผสมผสานระหว่างสื่อออฟ์ไลน์และสื่อออนไลน์

job_responsibilities: ['[About this Job]LINE Thailand is looking for a talented QA Engineer who has experience in Agile software development, and who will be a quality owner of their products, and will be able to innovate, drive process improvement, advocate quality mindset, and achieve quality excellence in the product development team.With 44 Million LINE users in Thailand (covers 95% of all smartphone users), LINE Thailand Engineering team is dedicated to build a variety of excellent services and applications to bring convenience, efficiency, and fun to Thai users’ lives. Our vision is to make LINE indispensable to users’ lives, not just for chat, but providing services in all areas, such as B2B services (E-Commerce platform, Business Platform for [emailprotected] and Official accounts, etc). Content services (LINE TV, LINE Melody, LINE Today etc), etc. If you want to challenge yourself and make some great impacts in 44 Million Thai users lives, be a part of it![Responsibilities]Work in a team to deliver a quality of product/service across clients and server-side technologies.Requirement analysis, infrastructure planning with teams (Developers, DevOps, Business).Designing, writing, reviewing and executing details test cases, validating tests across the full test spectrum of functional and cross-functional tests, and analyze results.Collaborate with different teams across projects to make sure quality is embedded in both processes and technologies.Define project sign-off criteria and release process.Identify and determine the cause of quality issues and drive corrective and take preventive actions to resolve them.Take ownership of product quality strategy and test plan.Be a quality advocate in the development team, advocating quality mindset/culture.Understand business value, software architecture to create the appropriate testing strategy.Adapt to fast-changing and evolving startup environment[']
job_qualifications: [']BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.Minimum 3 years of relevant work experience in quality assurance and testing fieldGood verbal and written communication skills.Good command of spoken and written English.Strong organizational skills and a team player.Highly motivated, proactive and enthusiastic.Detail-oriented and analytical-mindedEager to learn new technologies, tools, methodsExperience at least one automated test framework and tools.Experience in native mobile application and/or web application is a plus.Experience in Cypress/Jest is a plus.Experience in non-functional testing is a plus.Experience with LINE ecosystem is a plus.E-commerce knowledge is a plus. ']
job_description: [About this Job]LINE Thailand is looking for a talented QA Engineer who has experience in Agile software development, and who will be a quality owner of their products, and will be able to innovate, drive process improvement, advocate quality mindset, and achieve quality excellence in the product development team.With 44 Million LINE users in Thailand (covers 95% of all smartphone users), LINE Thailand Engineering team is dedicated to build a variety of excellent services and applications to bring convenience, efficiency, and fun to Thai users’ lives. Our vision is to make LINE indispensable to users’ lives, not just for chat, but providing services in all areas, such as B2B services (E-Commerce platform, Business Platform for [emailprotected] and Official accounts, etc). Content services (LINE TV, LINE Melody, LINE Today etc), etc. If you want to challenge yourself and make some great impacts in 44 Million Thai users lives, be a part of it![Responsibilities]Work in a team to deliver a quality of product/service across clients and server-side technologies.Requirement analysis, infrastructure planning with teams (Developers, DevOps, Business).Designing, writing, reviewing and executing details test cases, validating tests across the full test spectrum of functional and cross-functional tests, and analyze results.Collaborate with different teams across projects to make sure quality is embedded in both processes and technologies.Define project sign-off criteria and release process.Identify and determine the cause of quality issues and drive corrective and take preventive actions to resolve them.Take ownership of product quality strategy and test plan.Be a quality advocate in the development team, advocating quality mindset/culture.Understand business value, software architecture to create the appropriate testing strategy.Adapt to fast-changing and evolving startup environment[Qualification]BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related technical field or equivalent practical experience.Minimum 3 years of relevant work experience in quality assurance and testing fieldGood verbal and written communication skills.Good command of spoken and written English.Strong organizational skills and a team player.Highly motivated, proactive and enthusiastic.Detail-oriented and analytical-mindedEager to learn new technologies, tools, methodsExperience at least one automated test framework and tools.Experience in native mobile application and/or web application is a plus.Experience in Cypress/Jest is a plus.Experience in non-functional testing is a plus.Experience with LINE ecosystem is a plus.E-commerce knowledge is a plus.

job_description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบพัฒนาเว็บไซต์ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย มีความรู้วความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับFront ent Technology คุณสมบัติดังนี้วุฒิการศึกษาขั้นต่ำระดับปริญญาตรี ทางด้าน วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ วิศวคอมพิวเตอร์ เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องหากเป็นผู้ชายจะต้องผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหารเรียบร้อยแล้วมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับFront end Technology เช่น HTML5,CSS,Javascript,Bootstrapเป็นต้น เป็นอย่างดี มีความรู้ความเข้าใจและสามารถพัฒนาระบบด้วยภาษาC# .NET MVC เป็นอย่างดี มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับระบบฐานข้อมูลเชิงสัมพันธ์ (Relational Database)เป็นอย่างดี มีความรู้ความเข้าใจและสามารถพัฒนาหรือเชื่อมต่อระบบกับWeb Service หรือ API อื่นในรูปแบบต่างๆ เช่น JSON Format หรือ XML Format เป็นต้น ได้เป็นอย่างดี สามารถใช้งานSource Control ได้เป็นอย่างดีมีความเข้าใจพื้นฐานเกี่ยวการออกแบบกับUX/UI สำหรับ Web Application ที่ดี มีทักษะในการสื่อสารกับทีมที่ดีมีความรับผิดชอบต่อทีม และต่องานที่ทำสวัสดิการค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา ค่าน้ำมันรถ, ค่าเดินทาง ค่ายานพาหนะ ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วัน เวลาทำงาน 9.30น. - 18.30น.ประกันสังคม มีเวลาการทำงานที่ยืดหยุ่นลาบวช โบนัส ติดต่อสมัครงานได้ที่ HRผู้ติดต่อ :คุณอ้อเบอร์โทรศัพท์ :0970520493ที่อยู่ :21/61-62 ซอยศูนย์วิจัย ถนนพระราม 9 แขวงบางกะปิ เขตห้วยขวาง กรุงเทพฯ 10310

job_description: Accenture isa leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services instrategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. We combine unmatched experience and specialized capabilities across more than 40 industries – powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers.With 505,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture brings continuous innovation to helpclients improve their performance and create lasting value across their enterprises. Visit us atwww.accenture.comKey responsibilities include:Develop and configure high-quality Oracle Cloud Application by producing clean, efficient code to address customer business requirementsEnsure functionality, security and performance of software systemPerform unit testingCollaborate with internal and external teams to fix and improve applicationWork with BA/SA to design and develop software applications using Groovy Script and SQL.Understand SOAP Web Service and REST API framework on Oracle Cloud ApplicationQualifications2+ years’ experience in web development language such asGroovy ScriptJava for Web ApplicationJavaScript1+ years’ experience in Database development language such asSQLPL/SQL0-1 years’ experience in Oracle Cloud ApplicationInterested to explore new technologiesYou will also have opportunities to hone your functional skills and expertise in an area of specialization. The sheer variety of work we do, and the experience it offers, provide an unbeatable platform from which to build a career.

What You Will Be Doing:Designing, building, testing, and deploying new and enhanced mobile apps & services (iOS).Working closely with Product Management to collaborate on new requirements, applications and features.Working collaboratively with other SCRUM team members (e.g. server-side developers | web developers) to effectively deliver mobile experiences.Working collaboratively with UX/UI/QA resources to test, troubleshoot, resolve, and release production applications.Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.Working with a variety of APIs to access critical data for integration.What We Require:2+ years of web development experiences in vue.JS.Knowledge of UI Testing and Unit Testing is a plus.Experience developing collaboratively within a SCRUM team with Agile delivery framework.Solid understanding of good UI/UX practices and creating high-performance mobile application experiences.Familiarity with Linux/Unix hosting environment configuration and scripting.Use of a project management tool such as Jira.Good problem-solving skills.Having strong work ethics and service mind.

QUALIFICATIONS:Education:Degree holder in the field of Finance, Business Administration preferably in Supply Chain fieldSkills and Experience:Scala/SAP & Microsoft application knowledgeHigh proficiency in spreadsheetsProficient in English– spoken & writtenMinimum 2-5 years relevant experience, preferably in planning, business metrics analyticsStrong analytical skills and able to synthesize large amounts of dataStrong customer focusAble to interface, negotiate, influence and exchange information with all levels of management, cross-functional teams and relevant external stakeholdersKEY RESPONSIBILITIES:The role will be responsible for data collection, collation, and analysis of in-market sales to support the businesses.Work closely with Business and Distributors to collect, collate, analyze and upload In-Market data.Ensure accuracy of IMS uploads in IMS QV and correct exceptions and errors during the upload process.Act as Salesforce Administrator by maintaining new accounts, IMS accounts, branch codes and ensuring alignment between data in IMS QV vs Salesforce.com.Work closely with Business and Distributors to collect, collate and analyze DPP (Demand Purchase Plan) file i.e., In-Market Sales, In-Market Projection, Inventory, Purchase Orders and Purchase Plans. Support the monthly consensus process by providing variance and performance measure reports and analysis.In close coordination with Distributors, ensure that consensus meeting outputs reflected in the DPP template are executed i.e., check Distributor PO before sending to APSSC CS for execution.. job_responsibilities: ['We are seeking for a network engineer to design, implement and support Lumentum global networks and telecom services. new technologies and solutionsMaintain and audit asset inventory']

job_responsibilities: ['Role Purpose:Designing and implementing software testing activities to ensure the quality of deliverablesReview requirements, specifications to provide timely and meaningful feedback in order to ensure that requirements stated are correct, unambiguous, and verifiableExecute test plans and create test reports to describe program evaluation, testing, and correctionCreate detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases for new or updated software projects to determine if the software will perform accurately and reliably according to documented requirements as well as established standards under both normal and abnormal conditionsEstimate, prioritize, plan, coordinate testing activities, and perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolvedIdentify, record, document thoroughly and track defectsInvestigate the causes of non-conforming softwareSupport users by prepared manual guideline and train users for the enhancement or workaround solutions']

job_responsibilities: ['Job Summary:The Information Technology Audit unit creates values by providing impactful recommendations around IT Governance, IT processes, software development process, and new emerging technologies.Job Description:Identify key risks in the bank or subsidiaries’ digital applications, e.g. security and application controls over digital channels, robotic process transformation projects, or new digital services and machine learning-related business modelsPlan and execute audit engagements, including identifying and analyzing business processes, key risks and controls; interviewing auditees; determining audit scope; evaluating control design adequacy; and testing control performance effectiveness and making evaluations which effectively achieve audit objectivesPrepare audit working papers findings with root causes and appropriate recommendations as well as assisting team in drafting the audit reports Collaborate audit activities by integrating with other internal audit subject matter teams (business process audit and Information Technology audit teams etc.) to ensure appropriate and efficient audit coverage of the operational and technology risksGive internal control advises on relevant new digital banking initiatives as well as collaborating across the three lines of defense regarding business processes, technological risks, and controls.Keep up to date with new digital and technologies as well as their risks and technological concerns']
job_qualifications: [":Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information technology, Digital law or related fieldsAt least 3 years’ experience in information technology audit experiencePreferably in experience with the following topics: mobile banking security, APIs and microservice architectures, biometric security, machine learning, or blockchain Familiar with relevant banking and financial service industry knowledge and knowledge of Agile or Scrum and DevOps conceptsCertified CISA, CRISC, or IT Security related professional certificatesGood command in verbal and written English communication "]
job_description: Job Summary:The Information Technology Audit unit creates values by providing impactful recommendations around IT Governance, IT processes, software development process, and new emerging technologies.Job Description:Identify key risks in the bank or subsidiaries’ digital applications, e.g. security and application controls over digital channels, robotic process transformation projects, or new digital services and machine learning-related business modelsPlan and execute audit engagements, including identifying and analyzing business processes, key risks and controls; interviewing auditees; determining audit scope; evaluating control design adequacy; and testing control performance effectiveness and making evaluations which effectively achieve audit objectivesPrepare audit working papers findings with root causes and appropriate recommendations as well as assisting team in drafting the audit reports Collaborate audit activities by integrating with other internal audit subject matter teams (business process audit and Information Technology audit teams etc.) to ensure appropriate and efficient audit coverage of the operational and technology risksGive internal control advises on relevant new digital banking initiatives as well as collaborating across the three lines of defense regarding business processes, technological risks, and controls.Keep up to date with new digital and technologies as well as their risks and technological concernsQualification:Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information technology, Digital law or related fieldsAt least 3 years’ experience in information technology audit experiencePreferably in experience with the following topics: mobile banking security, APIs and microservice architectures, biometric security, machine learning, or blockchain Familiar with relevant banking and financial service industry knowledge and knowledge of Agile or Scrum and DevOps conceptsCertified CISA, CRISC, or IT Security related professional certificatesGood command in verbal and written English communication

job_responsibilities: ['Responsibilities:The position is responsible for the effective delivery of information technology infrastructure services which includes the technology infrastructure, operations, engineering, architecture, end user support services, data records management, mail services, and enterprise document management functions. Technology infrastructure includes Hyper-Converged Infrastructure, servers, storage, facilities, networking & appliances, mobility/VPN, email (exchange) and other messaging services, collaboration services (including video), mobile devices and management, network administration, infrastructure architecture and engineering.Contribute To The Company’s Success Through Excellent Customer Service And Meeting Or Exceeding Performance Objectives For The Following Major Job FunctionsProvide vision for infrastructure services, enable innovation, and analyze technology trends to provide infrastructure services strategy, architecture, and delivery processes designed for agility and cost effectiveness to accelerate business value consistent with the company’s requirements and expectations.Lead strategic technology initiatives to build and maintain key elements of the company’s enterprise infrastructure, including but not limited to: cloud service management, automation roadmap, on premise hosting services and management, modern business resiliency platforms, mobility and remote access services, wireless and wired networks, enterprise-scale messaging environments, and innovative end user computing solutions. Create the appropriate balance between internal engineering efforts and ones that can be performed by third party partners with an emphasis on internal employees solving for complex business problems while partners engineer commodity solutionsProvide leadership for delivery of data center and cloud service operations, OKRs and KPI compliance. Establish, maintain and continuously improve a set of metrics that visualize productivity, capacity, quality and people dimensions. Leverage Lean management system and tools to ensure alignment of these dimensions across the team and organization. Establish key performance indicators and service level agreements to continually improve the performance of IT infrastructure services and operations. Defines, develops and manages a comprehensive and integrated ITSM landscape based on best practice processes, disciplines and related toolsets.Lead and manage budgets and budget planning efforts, including associated business case justifications and cost/benefit analysis for infrastructure and operations spending and initiatives.Develop workforce plans that identify required skills, proficiencies and development needs. Establish appropriate sourcing strategies to achieve the best mix of internal and external labor consistent with capacity requirements. Manage outsourcing arrangement to ensure efficient and cost-effective delivery. Drive creation of appropriate engineering, architecture, vendor management and service delivery management practices to facilitate consistency and predictability. Ensure internal usage compliance, maintaining entitlements and deployments in a central location.Acts as a trusted advisor and builds and maintains relationships with other IT leaders and business executives to develop a clear understanding of business needs. Ensures cost-effective delivery of IT services to meet those needs and can respond with the agility required to address changing business priorities.Promote, plan and manage the identification and leveraging of existing technology to gain business efficiencies from our technological investment. Monitor on-going maintenance support levels and ensure post project implementation follow-up evaluations occur within acceptable timeframes. Manage the full life-cycle of the infrastructure portfolio. Maintain roadmaps for all elements of the portfolio to ensure that appropriate evolution, replacement and sunset strategies are implemented.']
job_qualifications: ['sEducation:At least Bachelor’s degree in systems engineering, computer science, management of information systems or related field.Experience:15 years progressively responsible management of infrastructure services, and staff or related functions, or the equivalent combination of education and/or relevant experience. job_description: Job Description:Design and implement web backend services using Python + Django/FlaskWrite high-quality, clean, maintainable code using engineering best practices (unit testing, source control, continuous integration, automation, design patterns, etc.)Analyse requirements, design and develop featuresUnderstand the product, constantly optimise the product, identify and fix problems, improve stability and user experienceOptimize application for maximum performance and scalabilityBuild reusable code and librariesCollaborate with fellow developers, product managers, user experience designer, and operation engineers to build products with web technologiesRequirements:Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related fieldsMore than 2 years of relevant experiencePassionate about coding and programming, innovation, and solving challenging problemsHands-on experiences in Web Service frameworks and technologies such as Django, Ruby On Rails, or Node.jsFamiliar with HTTP protocolFamiliar with performance tuning of Web Server, massive concurrency handling, and caching mechanismsIn-depth understanding of data structures, Database and other computer science fundamentalsFamiliar with Linux development environmentsHands-on experiences and knowledge on relational databases such as MySQL(Preferred)Knowledge in web security(Preferred)Applicants must be willing to work in SingaporeFresh graduates are welcome to applyApplicants must be able to speak and write in English and Native Thai

We are a group of software engineers who take coding seriously and understand programming as a science. job_title: IT (ดูแลระบบ Server)
job_description: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบMeeting with the IT Manager to discuss system needs. Designing and installing computer hardware configurations. Installing software and networking systems. Troubleshooting network and software issues. Installing high-level software security systems. Training staff on newly installed hardware and software systems. Fixing hardware, software, and networking issues. Responding to general IT requests. Ensuring security software is kept up to date. Filing monthly reports for the IT Manager ดูแลงานด้าน ระบบ ITSever ทั้งหมดขององค์กรconfigurations firewallดูแลระบบ LAN, Network , คอมพิวเตอร์ และ Hardware ต่าง ๆ ด้าน IT ภายในองค์กรดูแลและบริหารจัดการระบบโทรศัพท์ขององค์กร ตลอดจนค่าใช้จ่ายของระบบโทรศัพท์ทั้งหมดจัดหาและจัดซื้ออุปกรณ์ด้าน IT ที่ต้องนำมาใช้งานภายในองค์กรจัดทำและดูแลระบบการควบคุมทรัพย์สินด้าน IT ขององค์กรพัฒนาวางแผนการด้านระบบงาน ITและเทคนิคต่าง ๆงานอื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายเพิ่มเติมคุณสมบัติเพศ ชายวุฒิปริญญาตรี สาขาคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือเทคโนโลยีคอมพิวเตอร์ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ในด้านการทำงาน ดูแลระบบ Server Firewall, Network อย่างน้อย 3 ปีสามารถติดตั้งและแก้ไขปัญหาระบบ Server Firewall, MS Windows, Office, Network, Antivirus, Mail Client รวมถึง Hardware ต่างๆสามารถใช้งานโปรแกรม MS Office ในการจัดทำเอกสารได้ดีมีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี รักงานบริการ สุภาพ และรู้จักวิธีการแก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดีมีความกระตือรือร้นในการเรียนรู้งานใหม่ ๆ การแก้ไขปัญหา และค้นหาปัญหาต่าง ๆมีความรับผิดชอบสูง และสามารถจัดลำดับความสำคัญของงานได้อย่างดี

job_responsibilities: ["RABBIT-LINE PAY COMPANY LIMITED is a joint venture between LINE-the number one Chat Application in Thailand, Rabbit-the first e-money service in Thailand with a common ticketing platform in BTS and AIS-the number one mobile operator in Thailand. \u200bWe are the first to connect both online and offline platforms together. As we're expanding our service lines, we're building up our organization to be an energetic working environment.General Description:The Compliance Manager provides supportsin compliance aspect and make sure that all company services and products complied with the Bank of Thailand and the Anti-Money Laundering Office regulations. This position holder has to collaborate all audit activities as well as ensure all IT processes and technology initiatives followed the PDPA (Personal Data Protection Act).Responsibilities:To support in compliance aspect and follow-up relevant legislation, regulations and implement applicable requirements from the Bank of Thailand and the Anti-Money Laundering OfficeTo correspond with relevant regulatory agencies and recommend corrective action and suggest improvementTo establish and update company regulations in accordance with local law and regulationsTo monitor business and operation procedures are complied with local law, regulation and company guidelineTo investigate & report financial incidents including fraud, money launderingTo raise potential & existing compliance issues to management in a timely and accurate mannerTo drive compliance culture by developing methods & contents for company-widecompliance communication and training programs.To assist with the development, implementation, and maintenance of an anti-money laundering program.To Develop and maintain a risk assessment framework for products and services, clients and customers, and other issues relating to money laundering.To Keep and maintain records of high risk customers, and reporting suspicious activities to the authorities.To Arrange and implement inspections and audits from third-party organizations, and making compliance recommendations based on their findings.To identify and plan for development of further business opportunities and deliver value added measurementTo plan and execute audit engagements, including identify and analyze IT system, IT operation processes, key risks and controls; determine audit scope; evaluating control design adequacy; and testing control performance To coordinate with other members and executives in order to conduct the IT audit programTo monitor data privacy risks arising in the Company activitiesTo raise awareness on how data privacy law affect data processing requirements and conduct a training and assessmentsTo carry out other duties and special assignments as assigned by the Management Team"]

job_responsibilities: ['Responsibility•Apply Data analytic, Data Mining, Machine Learning to solve the problems relating to Asset Reliability, Performance and Optimization•Work closely with domain experts, asset and plant owners to define problems, collect data, develop hypothesis, extract critical information and validate the findings using an experimental and iterative approach, as well as communicating results back. •Explore the opportunity to apply data analytic and leverage digital technology to enhance Asset Reliability, Performance and Optimization•Conduct research and development, collaborative works with cross functional teams as well as external partners to enhance capability of data analytic works.']
job_qualifications: ['s:•Bachelor’s or higher in Engineering (Any field)•Male or Female; age not over 35 years old•2-5 years work experience in the field of Operation, Maintenance and reliability, Data Analytic, Data Engineering, Machine Learning or related field.•Proficient in R, Python, Matlab, SQL and/or other statistical languages•Good appreciation and experience as user of process instrumentation (Honeywell/Yokogawa)•Good appreciation and experience as user in plant information system, PHD/PI system•Strong interpersonal skill, communication skill, and collaboration skill•Excellent in initiation, self direction, problem solving and achievement orientation ']
job_description: Responsibility•Apply Data analytic, Data Mining, Machine Learning to solve the problems relating to Asset Reliability, Performance and Optimization•Work closely with domain experts, asset and plant owners to define problems, collect data, develop hypothesis, extract critical information and validate the findings using an experimental and iterative approach, as well as communicating results back. •Explore the opportunity to apply data analytic and leverage digital technology to enhance Asset Reliability, Performance and Optimization•Conduct research and development, collaborative works with cross functional teams as well as external partners to enhance capability of data analytic works.Qualifications:•Bachelor’s or higher in Engineering (Any field)•Male or Female; age not over 35 years old•2-5 years work experience in the field of Operation, Maintenance and reliability, Data Analytic, Data Engineering, Machine Learning or related field.•Proficient in R, Python, Matlab, SQL and/or other statistical languages•Good appreciation and experience as user of process instrumentation (Honeywell/Yokogawa)•Good appreciation and experience as user in plant information system, PHD/PI system•Strong interpersonal skill, communication skill, and collaboration skill•Excellent in initiation, self direction, problem solving and achievement orientation

job_responsibilities: ["Job briefWe are looking forUX/UI Designer for Swish Team to implementing the project. You will responsible for design UX/UI and recommend business solutions with new technology to customers. We required your business solution skill to recommend customers. You also will work on a range of exciting innovation, proposition development, product launch projects in Thailand and beyond.Swish team informationWe are a new business unit of I AM consulting group to drive in Technology innovation to sustain competitive advantage, to access new markets, and to move from product-driven to customer-driven. We will initiate new solutions or products or services with innovation for the upcoming era (Digital era, AI era) to build a new business model and generate revenue for I AM. Swish team will be innovators to work as lean startup way.Responsibilities:Investigating user experience design requirements to design ideas.Developing and conceptualizing a comprehensive UI/UX design strategy.Producing high quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.Validate your designs assumption and key milestone deliverables to peers and stakeholders.Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, and standards.Ensure all versions of project UX/UI documents are complete, current, and stored/ archived appropriately.Produce user requirements, specifications, personas, storyboards, scenarios, flowcharts, design prototypes, and design specifications based on project implementation required.Providing advice and guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies and testing activities in order to analyze and predict user behavior.Qualifications (Essentials)Bachelor's or higher DegreeMinimum of 3 years' experience in UX, UI and graphic design fields.Experience in UI/UX for desktop and mobile is preferred.Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.Can explain your decisions and process.Ability to communicate and presentation in Thai and English.Fast learner and willing to contribute.Ability to manage multiple assignments and tight deadlines.A team player but can work independently by self-assign."]

job_responsibilities: ['Company DescriptionMinor International (MINT) is a global company focused on three core businesses: restaurants, hospitality and lifestyle brands distribution. MINT is one of Asia’s largest restaurant companies with over 2,000 outlets operating system-wide in 19 countries under The Pizza Company, Swensen’s, Sizzler, Dairy Queen, Burger King, Thai Express, The Coffee Club, BreadTalk (Thailand) and Riverside brands. MINT is also a hotel owner, operator and investor with a portfolio of 155 hotels and serviced suites under the Anantara, AVANI, Oaks, Tivoli, Elewana Collection, JW Marriott, Four Seasons, St. Regis, Radisson Blu and Minor International brands in 24 countries across Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Africa, the Indian Ocean, Europe and South America. MINT is one of Thailand’s largest distributors of lifestyle brands focusing primarily on fashion, home and kitchenware and contract manufacturing. Its brands include Gap, Banana Republic, Brooks Brothers, Esprit, Bossini, Etam, Charles & Keith, Pedro, Radley, Anello, Zwilling J.A. Henckels, Joseph Joseph and ETL Learning. Bemynt is MINT’s e-commerce platform offering premium fashion and lifestyle products. For more information, please visit www.minorinternational.com.Job DescriptionSummary:TheRPA Developeris a new key position with responsibilities that include building automated process by RPA, data importing and exporting from Oracle ERP, data warehousing, and backend supporting for RPA applications. This role is part of Accounting Shared Service (GSSC)Process Improvement team that works with other Shared Service team members and business units to deliver excellent service to the organization. UiPath is the RPA software we use.Responsibilities:Design, develop, and test solutions to automate processes, activities, and tasks through RPA and enhanced workflow automation platforms for Accounting Shared Service.Participate in requirements gathering and design through meetings, interviews, and workshops.Build and maintain sets of automations for multiple processes.Participate in deployment of RPA platform components, including bots, orchestrators, development tools, and systems integrations, to meet IT Corporate requirements for security, scalability, and performance.Communicate with the team on progress and the plan, and report any issues to team leaderParticipate in QA testing activities, including testing tasks and end-to-end process levels, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.Analyze, troubleshoot, and resolve problems and issues. Report, track, and address defects.Document technical designs, and other project documentation to support development, security, operations, and maintenance.']
job_qualifications: ['sRequirements:Degree in Computer Science and/or MIS preferred.0-4 year experiences with one or more RPA technologies e.g. Uipath, Automation Anywhere, Blue Prism1+ years of software development experience.Ability to design, build, program, test and deployExperience in HTML, SQL, and either VB.NET/C# .NET Core or Java.Knowledge on AWS concept and Oracle Database will be an advantageKnowledge and experience in streamlining business processes will be a plusProficient in Microsoft Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.Must be an adaptable self-starter and work with minimal supervision. Must be able to handle multiple projects and organize time effectively.Ability to work well with business unit, vendors, and end users in cross-functional teams.Strong communication skillsAdditional InformationExperience in VB.NET, C#, Visual Basic and macro development is highly preferred. New graduate is also welcome. ']
job_description: Company DescriptionMinor International (MINT) is a global company focused on three core businesses: restaurants, hospitality and lifestyle brands distribution. MINT is one of Asia’s largest restaurant companies with over 2,000 outlets operating system-wide in 19 countries under The Pizza Company, Swensen’s, Sizzler, Dairy Queen, Burger King, Thai Express, The Coffee Club, BreadTalk (Thailand) and Riverside brands. MINT is also a hotel owner, operator and investor with a portfolio of 155 hotels and serviced suites under the Anantara, AVANI, Oaks, Tivoli, Elewana Collection, JW Marriott, Four Seasons, St. Regis, Radisson Blu and Minor International brands in 24 countries across Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Africa, the Indian Ocean, Europe and South America. MINT is one of Thailand’s largest distributors of lifestyle brands focusing primarily on fashion, home and kitchenware and contract manufacturing. Its brands include Gap, Banana Republic, Brooks Brothers, Esprit, Bossini, Etam, Charles & Keith, Pedro, Radley, Anello, Zwilling J.A. Henckels, Joseph Joseph and ETL Learning. Bemynt is MINT’s e-commerce platform offering premium fashion and lifestyle products. For more information, please visit www.minorinternational.com.Job DescriptionSummary:TheRPA Developeris a new key position with responsibilities that include building automated process by RPA, data importing and exporting from Oracle ERP, data warehousing, and backend supporting for RPA applications. This role is part of Accounting Shared Service (GSSC)Process Improvement team that works with other Shared Service team members and business units to deliver excellent service to the organization. UiPath is the RPA software we use.Responsibilities:Design, develop, and test solutions to automate processes, activities, and tasks through RPA and enhanced workflow automation platforms for Accounting Shared Service.Participate in requirements gathering and design through meetings, interviews, and workshops.Build and maintain sets of automations for multiple processes.Participate in deployment of RPA platform components, including bots, orchestrators, development tools, and systems integrations, to meet IT Corporate requirements for security, scalability, and performance.Communicate with the team on progress and the plan, and report any issues to team leaderParticipate in QA testing activities, including testing tasks and end-to-end process levels, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.Analyze, troubleshoot, and resolve problems and issues. Report, track, and address defects.Document technical designs, and other project documentation to support development, security, operations, and maintenance.QualificationsRequirements:Degree in Computer Science and/or MIS preferred.0-4 year experiences with one or more RPA technologies e.g. Uipath, Automation Anywhere, Blue Prism1+ years of software development experience.Ability to design, build, program, test and deployExperience in HTML, SQL, and either VB.NET/C# .NET Core or Java.Knowledge on AWS concept and Oracle Database will be an advantageKnowledge and experience in streamlining business processes will be a plusProficient in Microsoft Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.Must be an adaptable self-starter and work with minimal supervision. Must be able to handle multiple projects and organize time effectively.Ability to work well with business unit, vendors, and end users in cross-functional teams.Strong communication skillsAdditional InformationExperience in VB.NET, C#, Visual Basic and macro development is highly preferred. New graduate is also welcome.

job_title: ERP Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่ ERP
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน1. มีหน้าที่ในการจัดทำรายงานโดยการนำข้อมูลในระบบERPมาประมวลผลและจัดทำในรูปแบบที่สามารถนำไปใช้ต่อได้ง่ายตามความต้องการของหน่วยงานต่าง ๆ2. สนับสนุนให้ในแต่ละหน่วยงานสามารถเข้าถึงข้อมูลที่เหมาะสมและเป็นประโยชน์ และสามารถนำไปใช้ในการปฏิบัติงานให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพ (efficiency) และประสิทธิผล (effectiveness) อันจะส่งผลให้องค์กรมีความสามารถในการแข่งขันสูงสุด3. วิเคราะห์และสร้างรายงานจากฐานข้อมูลในระบบERP ตามความต้องการของหน่วยงานต่างๆ4. จัดเก็บ และนำเสนอความรู้ข้อมูลขององค์กรที่ครบถ้วน ถูกต้องและทันท่วงที5. จัดกิจกรรม อบรม เผยแพร่และแลกเปลี่ยนความรู้ ข้อมูลความรู้ต่างๆขององค์กร เพื่อให้พนักงานสามารถนำข้อมูลและองค์ความรู้มาใช้ในการปฏิบัติงานได้6. ติดตามการเข้าถึงและใช้ข้อมูลของแต่ละหน่วยงานเพื่อปรับปรุงงานและระบบบริหารความรู้และข้อมูลองค์กรอย่างต่อเนื่องคุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร1. ชาย / หญิง2. ปริญญาตรีสาขาคอมพิวเตอร์ โปรแกรมเมอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง3. ประสบการทำงานทางด้าน ERP 1- 2 ปี (ถ้าผ่านงาน Oracle database จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ)4. มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับ Java, SQL, Linux OS, Network System, LAN, VPN, Software, Hardware และอื่นๆ5. สามารถใช้งาน MS Office และ ระบบ Internet ได้6. สามารถพูดอ่านเขียนภาษาอังกฤษพอใช้7. มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์ พัฒนางานอยู่เสมอ

job_responsibilities: ['Accenture isa leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services instrategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all of these services. job_responsibilities: ['This is a key role for the FUJITSU GLOVIA (THAILAND) Ltd. organization. With GLOVIAs adoption of open technologies with the release of the G2 product, it is essential that we build up our expertise of those technologies in Thailand.Traditionally, like many ERP companies, we have relied heavily on our own technologies and programming languages and as this changes, we need to ensure that our staff develop their skills too.The applicant must be a team player, be patient and be ready to learn our programming languages and help others to learn the skills necessary to move the application forward. The team in Thailand has more than 15 years experience in ERP, so the business skills and development expertise is there already. Technical knowledge is therefore of utmost important in the successful applicant.Initially, the applicant will be working on supporting our own technologies/languages and over time, they will be expected to adopt to newer Microsoft based technologies.Responsibilities:Participate in product design for enhancing the existing product new functionalities base on Marketing requirements or Team Lead inputsConvert business and logical requirements into detailed technical specifications.Formulate, design and test the program primarily utilizing ProIV, PL/SQL and/or C# programming language.Utilize complex engineering and technical problem formulation to Glovia G2 sub-system components.Support the current ProIV based products provided by Glovia.Able to use professional concepts and company objectives to resolve complex issues in creative and effective ways.']

job_description: This is a key role for the FUJITSU GLOVIA (THAILAND) Ltd. organization. With GLOVIAs adoption of open technologies with the release of the G2 product, it is essential that we build up our expertise of those technologies in Thailand.Traditionally, like many ERP companies, we have relied heavily on our own technologies and programming languages and as this changes, we need to ensure that our staff develop their skills too.The applicant must be a team player, be patient and be ready to learn our programming languages and help others to learn the skills necessary to move the application forward. The team in Thailand has more than 15 years experience in ERP, so the business skills and development expertise is there already. Technical knowledge is therefore of utmost important in the successful applicant.Initially, the applicant will be working on supporting our own technologies/languages and over time, they will be expected to adopt to newer Microsoft based technologies.Responsibilities:Participate in product design for enhancing the existing product new functionalities base on Marketing requirements or Team Lead inputsConvert business and logical requirements into detailed technical specifications.Formulate, design and test the program primarily utilizing ProIV, PL/SQL and/or C# programming language.Utilize complex engineering and technical problem formulation to Glovia G2 sub-system components.Support the current ProIV based products provided by Glovia.Able to use professional concepts and company objectives to resolve complex issues in creative and effective ways.Qualification:3-5 years’ experience programmingExperience using a relational database - ORACLE, SQL Server, MySQL etc.Experience in Manufacturing or Finance system will be an advantage.Fluent in verbal and written English communication skillsGood analytical, problem solving and troubleshooting skillsHave energy and the ability to learn new technologies and solve problems, reported issues.Able to juggle multiple responsibilities and work effectively in fast paced environmentThai national or must be legally able to work in Thailand without the company having to obtain a work permit.The following skills knowledge or work experience is a plus:HTML 5, JQuery, and JavaScriptC#.Net, SQL Server (TSQL)Previous ERP or business application system experienceThe applicant must be self-motivated and be able to handle multiple projects simultaneously. Must be results driven, and take appropriate steps to achieve goals. A desire to work internationally is also important as we do have staff working in Los Angeles periodically.BenefitsDental insuranceFive-day work weekMedical insuranceTravel allowanceProvident fundYearly Health Check-upPlease email resume's via Apply Nowor send your details to :FUJITSU GLOVIA (THAILAND) Ltd.Level 25, Silom Complex191 Silom RoadBangrakBangkok 10500

job_responsibilities: ['The Cyber Security Analyst provides 24x7 eyes-on-glass service; formed from a team of security analysts with some years of experience. The monitoring and identification tier are responsible for the real-time monitoring and identification of security incidents. Analysts staffed at Level 1 monitor the MDR Centre main channel event streams within the MDR Centre security information and event management (SIEM) platform and otherMDR Centre tools. They identify suspicious activity, open an incident investigation and perform preliminary investigation to validate the incident. If the incident is determined to be more complex and requires more time and/or deeper expertise to analyse, the Tier 1 – Analyst will transfer the open investigation to Tier 2 for further analysis and escalation.Key ResponsibilitiesPerforms real-time monitoring of security alerts generated by various MDR tools deployed by True Digital.Investigates potential security incidents under the guidance of playbooks and procedures.Analyses and assesses security alerts.Validates, classifies and opens security incident cases or escalates to Level 2 analysts.Serves as a primary contact point for reporting potential security incidents.Document security incidents as identified by the case management process.Provides feedback on enhancing the operations of the cyber security operations centre.Responds to security alerts generate within the SLA time window.']
job_qualifications: ['sBachelor degree in science or engineering is preferable.Analytical and problem-solving skills are required.Some working knowledge in operating SIEM solutions.Knowledge and/or experience with common security tools such as anti-virus, intrusion detection and firewalls are required.Knowledge and/or experience with Microsoft Windows and Linux operating systems is required.Knowledge and/or experience with network protocols such as TCP/IP, Syslog, DNS and NetFlow is required.Experience in networking or application development is preferredKnowledge and/or experience with databases is preferred.Knowledge and/or experience with security vulnerability assessment tools is preferable.Good English communication, including conducting presentations and creating security incident reports, is required.Working experience in a MDR Centre, Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), or enterprise network environmentAble to work in Shift Hours ']
job_description: The Cyber Security Analyst provides 24x7 eyes-on-glass service; formed from a team of security analysts with some years of experience. The monitoring and identification tier are responsible for the real-time monitoring and identification of security incidents. Analysts staffed at Level 1 monitor the MDR Centre main channel event streams within the MDR Centre security information and event management (SIEM) platform and otherMDR Centre tools. They identify suspicious activity, open an incident investigation and perform preliminary investigation to validate the incident. If the incident is determined to be more complex and requires more time and/or deeper expertise to analyse, the Tier 1 – Analyst will transfer the open investigation to Tier 2 for further analysis and escalation.Key ResponsibilitiesPerforms real-time monitoring of security alerts generated by various MDR tools deployed by True Digital.Investigates potential security incidents under the guidance of playbooks and procedures.Analyses and assesses security alerts.Validates, classifies and opens security incident cases or escalates to Level 2 analysts.Serves as a primary contact point for reporting potential security incidents.Document security incidents as identified by the case management process.Provides feedback on enhancing the operations of the cyber security operations centre.Responds to security alerts generate within the SLA time window.QualificationsBachelor degree in science or engineering is preferable.Analytical and problem-solving skills are required.Some working knowledge in operating SIEM solutions.Knowledge and/or experience with common security tools such as anti-virus, intrusion detection and firewalls are required.Knowledge and/or experience with Microsoft Windows and Linux operating systems is required.Knowledge and/or experience with network protocols such as TCP/IP, Syslog, DNS and NetFlow is required.Experience in networking or application development is preferredKnowledge and/or experience with databases is preferred.Knowledge and/or experience with security vulnerability assessment tools is preferable.Good English communication, including conducting presentations and creating security incident reports, is required.Working experience in a MDR Centre, Security Operations Centre (SOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), or enterprise network environmentAble to work in Shift Hours

PRTR Technical is recruiting an IT Business Analyst (SAP) to work with a global manufacturing company based in Rayong.As the IT Business Analyst (SAP) you will have a strong ability to gather business requirements, before providing relevant solutions to improve business processes via SAP technology. You will need to improve processes across finance, supply chain, sales and manufacturing areas, therefore you will have technical knowledge in some or all of the following modules: SD, MM, PP, FI & CO.In this role you will also need to utilize your strong communication skills in Thai & English, as you will be responsible for the management and delivery of effective SAP solutions across the world.As the IT Business Analyst (SAP) you will have the following:Strong business analysis skills.3+ years’ experience, & functional experience in SAP (SD, PP, FICO, OR MM modules).Experience working in the manufacturing industry is highly desirable.Worked on regional projects involving communication with non-Thais.Strong problem-solving skills.Strong English / Thai communication skills.This is a very good opportunity for an IT Business Analyst (SAP) to work in a state-of-the-art technology focused manufacturing environment.If you are seeking a new and exciting position, then this is the role to take your career to the next level. Please kindly share your latest CV as we are short-listing for this role immediately.

รายละเอียดของงาน :Senior Developer  (ด่วน !!)มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการพัฒนา Software ด้วยหลักการ Algorithm, Validation, และ Debugging Concept ด้วย C# .Netมีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้ Programming Tool Visual Studioสามาถทำความเข้าใจระบบที่ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ได้ออกแบบไว้ช่วยเหลือ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ในการจัดทำเอกสาร Application Specทำความเข้าใจกับ Application Spec จาก Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc)ออกแบบ Technical Function ประสานงาน/ แสดงผลงาน/ รายงานสถานะความคืบหน้าของงาน ต่อหัวหน้าทีมที่รับผิดชอบให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการพัฒนา Softwareทำเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการพัฒนา ดูแล และควบคุมทีมงาน ให้ผลิตผลงานที่ถูกต้อง ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้เป็นที่ปรึกษาการทำงานให้กับทีมงาน ดูแล และจัดการ Resource ที่มี ให้ทำงานที่เหมาะสม และ ทำงานร่วมกันได้อย่างราบรื่น รวมทั้งลดความขัดแย้งที่เกิดขึ้นภายในทีมงานให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการทำงานแบบ Leaderคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครงาน :อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปี จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโทสาขาComputer Science, Computer Engineering, IT, MIS,Business Computer หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# อย่างน้อย 2 ปีมีความรู้ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# ระดับดีมีประสบการณ์การทำงานกับ IIS Serverมีความรู้และประสบการณ์การทำงาน ระบบฐานข้อมูล SQL Server และคำสั่ง SQL Statement, Store Procedure ระดับพื้นฐานมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Site Responsive, HTML & CSS, JQuery; JavaScript; AJAX; jSon;มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Service - SOAP and RESTมีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนาระบบ (Develop and Program) ในเชิงสถาปัตยกรรม N-Tiers (PT - MT - DT) ระดับดีสามารถวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของลูกค้า และออกแบบโปรแกรมได้ตามหลัก OOP (Object Oriented Programming) ระดับดีมีความรู้และประสบการณ์จัดการ Source Control และ Deploy Applicationมีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application ด้วย Xamarin จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีความสามารถและประสบการณ์ในการควบคุมงานของตนเองและทีมงาน ให้ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้สามารถจัดการ, แก้ไขปัญหาของงาน และทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ปรับตัวเพื่อการทำงานร่วมกับทีมงานได้เป็นอย่างดี และช่วยเหลือ แบ่งปัน เพื่อบรรลุจุดมุ่งหมายร่วมกันเปิดใจรับฟังความคิดใหม่ๆ และ มีความเพียรพยายามในการทำงานให้สำเร็จสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : จังหวัด กรุงเทพมหานครอัตราที่รับเพิ่ม 4 ตำแหน่งเงินเดือน40,000 - job_title: Embedded Programmer / IOT Developer/วิศวกรฮาร์ดแวร์ อิเล็กทรอนิกส์ และ IOT
job_description: สมัครงานร่วมทีมพัฒนาและวิจัยเครื่องเล่น Simulator เพื่อใช้กับเกมเราต้องการคนที่มีพื้นฐานอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ ที่สนใจ และชอบงานวิจัยพัฒนา Robotics, Simulator และ Electronics ต่างๆทุกคนจะได้เรียนรู้งาน และได้ประสบการณ์จริงในการเกม และ สร้างเครื่อง Simulator 4DOF, 6DOF, Racing simulator, Gyro และชิ้นส่วนหุ่นยนต์ต่างๆดูตัวอย่างงานต่างๆตามลิงค์ motionx.studio/career/sampleRequirementsมีความสามารถในออกแบบแผงวงจร, IOT หรือ เขียนโปรแกรมควบคุมอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ได้ประสบการณ์ในการทำงานด้าน Electronics engineer อย่างน้อย 2ปีมีความเข้าใจที่ดีใน C# หรือ C++Responsibilitiesวิเคราะห์ ตีโจทย์เพื่อหาวิธีที่ดีในการ ออกแบบชิ้นงานอิเล็กทรอนิกส์ทำงานร่วมกับ programmer ทีมสร้างเกม เพื่อที่จะสร้างชิ้นงานที่เหมาะสมที่สุดเขียนโปรแกรม IOT ต่างๆ หรือ วิจัยและเขียนวงจรเพื่อควบคุมมอเตอร์, automation, LED และ IO อื่นๆ

job_title: Senior Business Analyst - Collection Center Project
job_description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบพัฒนา ดูแลและจัดการ Business Requirement สำหรับโครงการ Collection Center อย่างเป็นระบบให้คำปรึกษากับตัวแทนหน่วยงานในการรวบรวม Requirement การกำหนดคุณสมบัติ เทคนิคและเครื่องมือในการตรวจสอบ Business Requirement ให้ครบถ้วนถูกต้องทดสอบระบบในการให้ข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม และแจกแจงรายละเอียดของ Business Requirement เพื่อให้สามารถพัฒนาระบบ จัดทำTest Scenario รวมทั้ง Test Scripts เป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุดวิเคราะห์ และพัฒนา Business Domain เพื่อให้การจัดทำ Work Flow และ Technical Requirement ในการพัฒนาระบบ และ โปรแกรม ครอบคลุมและรองรับธุรกิจได้ครบถ้วนประเมิน Software Solution ทั้งที่มีอยู่แล้วและที่มาจากแหล่ง Open Sources อื่นๆ รวมทั้ง System Architecture ที่เกี่ยวข้องซึ่งจะสามารถนำมาใช้ในโครงการฯ ให้สามารถรองรับ Business Requirement ได้อย่างครบถ้วน คุณสมบัติป.ตรี/ป.โท สาขาวิศวกรรมศาสตร์/วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์/สถิติ/บริหารธุรกิจ/เศรษฐศาสตร์/ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ 5 ปีขึ้นไปในงานด้าน Business Analyst/Business process improvement การ develop/implement ระบบ Collection/Contact Center มีประสบการณ์ project management มีความคิดเป็นระบบมีทักษะการคิดวิเคราะห์มีความกระตือรือร้น อดทน มุ่งมั่นสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน:สำนักงานใหญ่ สีลมสามารถสอบถามข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ คุณดวงกมลโทร.0-2685-7854
