job_title: UX & UI , Big C E-Commerce (Assistant Manager) **Urgently required**
job_responsibilities: ['Job Descriptions:Drive UI/UX aspects of Product Development Team initiatives and goals.Develop and define UX standards, research methods, best practices and processes and oversee their implementation.Conduct competitive research, discovery and usability research.Facilitate research sessions to identify business, user, and technical requirements.Effectively communicate design decisions to product and leadership teams.Use modern UX methodologies and techniques to inspire design thinking and create supporting documentation including personas, customer journeys, task flows, site maps, UI specifications & requirements, prototypes/wireframes.Prioritize UX project schedules and deliverables across multiple products.Stay current with UX, visual design, best practices and front-end technologies.Communicate with outsource or vendors according on working process.']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science / IT/ ICT or any related fields.2-3 years proven experience as mobile application or website design.Should have basic knowledge of wireframe design, mockup design for website and mobile application.Outstanding knowledge of UX/UI theoryconcept andpersonas analytics.Be able to handle multi-tasks/projects, work under pressure and meeting time line.Excellent in communication and interpersonal skills. ']
job_description: Job Descriptions:Drive UI/UX aspects of Product Development Team initiatives and goals.Develop and define UX standards, research methods, best practices and processes and oversee their implementation.Conduct competitive research, discovery and usability research.Facilitate research sessions to identify business, user, and technical requirements.Effectively communicate design decisions to product and leadership teams.Use modern UX methodologies and techniques to inspire design thinking and create supporting documentation including personas, customer journeys, task flows, site maps, UI specifications & requirements, prototypes/wireframes.Prioritize UX project schedules and deliverables across multiple products.Stay current with UX, visual design, best practices and front-end technologies.Communicate with outsource or vendors according on working process.Qualifications:Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science / IT/ ICT or any related fields.2-3 years proven experience as mobile application or website design.Should have basic knowledge of wireframe design, mockup design for website and mobile application.Outstanding knowledge of UX/UI theoryconcept andpersonas analytics.Be able to handle multi-tasks/projects, work under pressure and meeting time line.Excellent in communication and interpersonal skills.

job_description: Responsibilities:• Write “clean”, well-designed code.• Produce detailed specifications.• Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality.• Contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle.• Follow industry best practices.• Develop and deploy new features to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary.Qualifications:• Bachelor or Master degreein Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technologyor a related field.• Understanding of open source projects like Joomla, Drupal, Wikis, osCommerce, etc.• Understanding of framework like ZF3, Vue.JS, Bootstrap, etc.• Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX, etc.• Experience in common third-party APIs (Google, Facebook, Line, Youtube, etc).• Proven software development experience in PHP and Vue.JS(Node.JS) or Golang.• Good knowledge of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services.• Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas.

job_responsibilities: ['Job SummaryThe IT Support Manager is responsible for the day-to-day operation of the organization’scomputer systems and network, ensuring 24/7 operation of systems and when problems arise,provide quick and permanent solutions.Duties and responsibilitiesResponsibilities● Take ownership of internal employees’ issues reported and see problems through to resolution● Research, diagnose, troubleshoot and identify solutions to resolve issues● Follow standard procedures for proper escalation of unresolved issues to the appropriateinternal teams● Provide prompt and accurate feedback to employees● Ensure proper recording and closure of all issues● Prepare accurate and timely reportsDuties● Setting up accounts for staff, ensuring that they know how to log in● Installing and configuring computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers andscanners● Investigating, diagnosing and solving computer software and hardware faults● Planning and undertaking scheduled maintenance upgrades● Repairing equipment and replacing parts● Maintaining records of software licenses● Managing stocks of equipment, consumables and other supplies']

']
job_description: Job SummaryThe IT Support Manager is responsible for the day-to-day operation of the organization’scomputer systems and network, ensuring 24/7 operation of systems and when problems arise,provide quick and permanent solutions.Duties and responsibilitiesResponsibilities● Take ownership of internal employees’ issues reported and see problems through to resolution● Research, diagnose, troubleshoot and identify solutions to resolve issues● Follow standard procedures for proper escalation of unresolved issues to the appropriateinternal teams● Provide prompt and accurate feedback to employees● Ensure proper recording and closure of all issues● Prepare accurate and timely reportsDuties● Setting up accounts for staff, ensuring that they know how to log in● Installing and configuring computer hardware, software, systems, networks, printers andscanners● Investigating, diagnosing and solving computer software and hardware faults● Planning and undertaking scheduled maintenance upgrades● Repairing equipment and replacing parts● Maintaining records of software licenses● Managing stocks of equipment, consumables and other suppliesQualificationsRequirements● BS degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or equivalent● Language proficiency : English● 5-12 years working experience in enterprise technical support, IT support or as a technicalengineer● Knowledge of computer OS, software, equipments● Excellent Windows, Mac troubleshooting ability● Strong problem-solving skills● Excellent client-facing skills● Excellent written and verbal communication skills (email, documentation, etc)If you are a suitable match for this position and would like the opportunity to be a part ofthe Iyuno Thailand, please email us yourportfolio and CVinEnglishalong with your current and expected salary in CV by clicking "Apply Now".Please note only shortlisted candidates will be invited for an interview.

รายละเอียดของงาน- วางแผนกลยุทธ์ทางการตลาดในช่องทางออนไลน์ เขียนcontent ที่ดีน่าอ่าน ชวนติดตาม เพื่อให้เกิดยอดขายแก่ผลิตภัณฑ์ของบริษัท- คิดสื่อโฆษณาonline (Advertorials)ในรูปแบบต่างๆเพื่อกระตุ้นยอดขายของสินค้า- สรรหาช่องทางใหม่ๆ สื่อต่างๆเพื่อประชาสัมพันธ์ให้เกิดการรับรู้แบรนด์ของสินค้าบริษัท- คิดแคมเปญหรือกิจกรรมและสร้างสรรค์Content ในช่องทางออนไลน์ เช่น website,Facebook,instagram,Blog และ [emailprotected] ฯลฯ- วิเคราะห์ผลที่ได้จากการวางแผนแล้วนำมาปรับใช้ต่อไป- นำเสนอวิธีการและช่องทางการทำตลาดใหม่ๆเพื่อให้เกิดยอดขายในช่องทางOnlineงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร- อายุ 26 ปีขึ้นไป- จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาการตลาด- สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษได้ดี- มีประสบการณ์งานด้านการตลาดออนไลน์ การเขียนContent การวางแผนกลยุทธ์- ถ้ามีประสบการณ์ด้านสินค้าIT , Network จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ- ต้องมีประสบการณ์ด้านการตลาดออนไลน์ เช่น การทำSEO,SEM การใช้ Google Adword, Google analytic , Facebook Marketing and analytic- มีทักษะการสื่อสารดี สามารถนำเสนอได้- สามารถใช้Adobe Photoshop , Adobe Illustrator จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

รายละเอียดของงาน-Support ข้อมูลทางเทคนิคสำหรับฝ่ายขายและฝ่ายปฏิบัติงาน-Support ข้อมูลเทคนิคสำหรับลูกค้า- รับเรื่องปัญหาด้านITผ่านทางอีเมล์, โทรศัพท์ และ ช่องทางอื่นๆ- พัฒนาความรู้เพื่อรองรับเทคโนโลยีให้ทันกับปัจจุบันคุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร- อายุ 27 ปีขึ้นไป- จบการศึกษาระดับ ป.ตรี ด้านไอที,วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์,วิศวคอมพิวเตอร์,โทรคมนาคม,เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง- สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษได้ดี- สามารถเข้าใจระบบTCP/IP, optic fiber, การสื่อสารข้อมูลดิจิตอล- สามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์,โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์,ระบบ เครือข่าย- มีความรู้เรื่องระบบเครือข่าย- สามารถวางแผน ติดตั้ง ดูแลรักษาระบบ คอมพิวเตอร์ หรือระบบงานอินเตอร์เน็ต และซ่อมบำรุงได้เป็นอย่างดี- มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในด้านไอทีเป็นอย่างดีและแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดีเยี่ยม- มีใจรักงานบริการ สามารถทำงานนอกเวลาและสถานที่ได้

job_responsibilities: ['Bangkok Bank is transforming its Transaction Banking business to adapt to the competitive, regulatory and technical challenges of today’s world.To support this journey, the Client Implementation Officer is responsible for managing the client onboarding process post-sales handover and achieving high levels of client satisfaction in order to maximize cross-selling opportunities and minimize client losses/revenue leakage. The role presents an opportunity to join a fast-paced, highly visible group of individuals passionate about changing the way Transactional Banking is performed.Job Description:Manage seamless client onboarding process post Sales handover including, documentation preparation, collection, negotiation, and review, managing the registration of products and accounts, as well as client training. Focus on SMEEnsure clients are sufficiently capable and equipped to perform transactions - through training, tools, and set-up of products, accountsMonitor and manage quality and SLA fulfillment for the end-to-end client implementation process, and drive appropriate process and client experience improvement initiatives and projects Provide feedback to Product Management on clients current/future product needsCollaborate with Sales for pitch design and complex sales issuesIn the longer term, engage customers during the implementation process, to understand current/future needs in order to maximize cross-selling opportunities and minimize client losses/revenue leakage Required Skills:Good analytical thinking, diligent and possesses good attention to detailAbility to deliver in an independent work environmentAbility to handle computer configuration problems, especially networkingGood in both written and spoken in English ( TOEIC 500 or equivalent )Good Project Management skills will be advantageous']

ลักษณะงานออกแบบ ติดตั้ง และดูแลระบบ Network และ Server ของ Dek-D.com บน Linuxติดตั้ง/พัฒนาเครื่องมือ ที่ใช้ในการดูแลระบบอัพเดตซอฟต์แวร์ต่าง ๆ ให้มีความปลอดภัยอยู่เสมอประสานงานกับทีมที่เกี่ยวข้องเมื่อระบบ มีปัญหาดูระบบที่สำคัญ เช่น Apache, Nginx, MariaDB, Mongo DB, Elastic Search, Git, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Node.js และอื่นๆ เพิ่มเติมในอนาคตคุณสมบัติไม่จำกัดเพศ อายุไม่เกิน 35 ปีสำหรับผู้ไม่มีประสบการณ์ ต้อง จบปริญญาตรีด้าน วิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์, วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์, วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องสำหรับผู้มีประสบการณ์ แต่จบไม่ตรงสาขาให้ส่งผลงานที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อพิจารณาหากสามารถเขียนโปรแกรมได้ ภาษาใดก็ได้ จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

job_responsibilities: ["Network EngineerLocation: Bangkok (Vipavadee Rangist)        or Rayong (Maptaput)Responsibilities:Network Administration:designs, develops, implements and support day to day operational systems that provide the necessary metrics for monitoring our environment proactively.Provide high-level support and technical expertise in networking technology, including LAN/WAN hardware, hubs, bridges and routers network management protocols, networking architecture, authentication practices and security administration.Work with vendors, clients, carriers and technical staff on network implementation, optimization and ongoing management.Implement network security policies and procedures.Assist in the design, development and implementation of communication services.Troubleshoots communication services for all voice and data needs.This includes phone service, WAN Communications and PBX services.Apply superior troubleshooting skills on all helpdesk services received from Tier 1 and Tier 2 technicians, in a timely fashion.Support all IT user request and repairs that are issued to end users.Follow through on tracking of helpdesk requests and provides support and incident resolution within a timely fashion as determined by IT SLA’s.Follow up on all incidents and contact end users to perform quality measurements that assist in tracking IT SLA’s.Schedule and tracks business partner resolution for any incidents that need to go outside of the company for resolution.Assist in incident management and works to resolve problems in a timely fashion with thorough follow up to end users to confirm problems have been resolved. Change Management:Follows all change management processes and procedures as required and makes recommendations for improvement to the change management process.TEAMWORK:build and maintain an effective working relationship with all peers.Coordinates and integrates departmental work activities with co-workers' work activities.Positively contributes to teams and other work groups to carry out departmental projects."]

job_description: Network EngineerLocation: Bangkok (Vipavadee Rangist)        or Rayong (Maptaput)Responsibilities:Network Administration:designs, develops, implements and support day to day operational systems that provide the necessary metrics for monitoring our environment proactively.Provide high-level support and technical expertise in networking technology, including LAN/WAN hardware, hubs, bridges and routers network management protocols, networking architecture, authentication practices and security administration.Work with vendors, clients, carriers and technical staff on network implementation, optimization and ongoing management.Implement network security policies and procedures.Assist in the design, development and implementation of communication services.Troubleshoots communication services for all voice and data needs.This includes phone service, WAN Communications and PBX services.Apply superior troubleshooting skills on all helpdesk services received from Tier 1 and Tier 2 technicians, in a timely fashion.Support all IT user request and repairs that are issued to end users.Follow through on tracking of helpdesk requests and provides support and incident resolution within a timely fashion as determined by IT SLA’s.Follow up on all incidents and contact end users to perform quality measurements that assist in tracking IT SLA’s.Schedule and tracks business partner resolution for any incidents that need to go outside of the company for resolution.Assist in incident management and works to resolve problems in a timely fashion with thorough follow up to end users to confirm problems have been resolved. Change Management:Follows all change management processes and procedures as required and makes recommendations for improvement to the change management process.TEAMWORK:build and maintain an effective working relationship with all peers.Coordinates and integrates departmental work activities with co-workers' work activities.Positively contributes to teams and other work groups to carry out departmental projects.Qualifications:Thai nationality onlyHave certificate in CCNP, CCNA, Cisco is a plusBachelor's Degree in Electronic, Computer Engineering(GPA higher than 2.75), Computer Science (GPA higher than 3.0)or any related fields At least 1-3 year of experience in Network Admin, Network Security or Data Network Excellence interpersonal communication skill, positive and a high degree of customer service aptitude Be able to work up-country as assigned Good command of English(Required TOEIC score at least 550)"Great Job, Great Working Environment, Great Salary and Benefit is waiting for you"Send your resume "NOW"orcall for more detail at“02-140-2987”บริษัทพีทีทีดิจิตอลโซลูชั่นส์จำกัดWebsite :http://www.pttdigital.com

Corporate IT is the backbone of our business. Our team helps Sea develop a competitive advantage through defining our technology objectives, assessing solution options, and devising technical solutions that help us achieve both strategic goals and meet operational requirements. As a part of our team, you’ll help deliver seamless IT experiences and support to our employees at Sea by providing responsive helpdesk service, stable networks and reliable IT systems.As the Team Lead for Corporate IT [Country], you will lead the team accountable for the daily oversight and overall operation of in [Country]. You will be responsible for planning, coordinating and supervising execution of projects, work assignments and workloads of the team.Job Description:Manage and lead [Country] Corp IT teams to deliver stable and robust IT solutions, and ensure smooth running of the day to day IT operations for all offices and warehouses and provide excellent support for employeesDevelop guidelines, processes, and procedures to enhance office IT Infrastructure resiliency and service availabilityDesign, develop and implement Business Continuity Plan and Disaster Recovery strategyProactively manage and report on project status, deliverables, risks and issues, while working closely with multiple stakeholdersBuild and maintain strong relationships with business partners and act as a liaison between IT and business teamsManage IT assets & inventories, IT procurement, budgeting and cost controlDrive a continuous improvement mind-set across the team through providing continuous support, training, coaching and mentorship to the teamJob Requirements:Diploma or Degree in Computer Sciences or Information Technology related. Minimum 5 years' of relevant experience operating in a similar roleExtensive experience developing and enforcing standards and procedures for project deliverables quality assurance, walk-throughs, issues reporting and change managementExperience in establishing, implementing and running the day-to-day operations. Able to lead and manage remote teams in a team-oriented and collaborative environment. Passion for the development of clearly-defined and optimized operational environments. Strong network knowledge and hands-on experience in Palo Alto, Cisco, and other network appliances. Rich experience in providing and operating enterprise services such as Active Directory, VPN, Wireless network, NAS, etc.Familiar with setup and configuration of Cisco devices such as firewall, switch, IP phones, wireless controller and access pointsHands-on experience in Windows server administration and basic knowledge in Linux server administration. Experience with ITSM tools, frameworksFamiliar with and good at managing documenting standard/applications operating proceduresStrong analytical and troubleshooting skills, especially when it comes to directly addressing user issues with software, hardware, and servers. Able to quickly identify problems and implement solutions with minimal downtimeStrong communication and interpersonal skills. Good command of written and spoken English

job_responsibilities: ["Software Tester (Junior - Mid-level)Overall job purpose:You will be a valued member of a cross-functional Agile team responsible for delivering technical solutions to help our clients find opportunity in ever-changing and complex customer, business, and regulatory requirements.We are:DST Financial Services International, a leading solution provider to financial services industry. We provide services to alternative asset managers, asset management service companies, banking companies, broker-dealers, distribution companies, insurance companies, and retirement companies. Every day our global offices work together to master the complexity of the financial industry to transform the most challenging tasks into opportunity and competitive advantage for our clients.We are looking for:A highly motivated individual with strong analytical skill and proven ability to quickly understand complex business and systems.A person with growth mind-set – someone who embrace challenges, adapt well to changes, proactive, be a problem solver, learn from experience, have the desire and put the effort to develop self.A team player who communicate and collaborate well with others. We are doing large scale software development with teams in different locations, communication and collaboration is crucial for success. Responsibilities:Research and analyze existing functionalities of the systems/applications, work together with the team to design, develop and deliver the solutions for clients.Ensure quality of deliverables by applying engineering practices such as TDD/BDD, Unit Testing and Automation Testing as needed.Work collaboratively with Project Manager, Product Owner, Project Leader/Scrum Master/Agile Coach, Solution Architects, Enterprise Architects and other counterparts in the US or other countries as needed. Qualifications:Minimum QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Management Information System or related field.Good command of spoken and written English.Experience in Java and Java-based Web application developmentExperience with HTML, CSS and Java ScriptKnowledge in Relational Database and SQLForJuniortoMid-levelMinimum 2 years of experience for Junior and 4 years of experience in Software Development for Mid-levelNew university graduates in relevant fields are welcomePreferred "]

job_title: Assistant Manager, Core Transport HLD & Deployment Management
job_responsibilities: ['Principal Accountability:Provide technical advice and guidance regarding solution and architecture designs for ISP network with high complexity and sophistication, according to capacity plan and ISP network policies, to ensure that designs are able to support the expected usage.Provide technical advice and guidance regarding capacity planning (Infra/Peering/IPLC/CDN) and management for ensure efficiency and effectiveness of ISP network.Provide technical advice and guidance in network policy & frame work to ISP network.Provide direction and guide to the implementation team for highly complex, internet expansion, and problem management activities, which require expertise and specialization, to ensure that they are set up accurately, on a timely basis, and according to plan and design. Provide recommendation as to which ISPs, MSOs and Telcos that dtac should establish direct interconnection withUnderstand dtac current peering policy (settlement based and free), as well as that for IP Transit and the cost and revenue structure associated with each modelHave a thorough understanding of dtac existing interconnection topology Help to drive project deliverables for executing successful deployment of ISP interconnection strategy.Identify, develop and maintain healthy working relationships with peering managers at ISPs, MSOs and TelcosUpdate continuously oneself on the advanced technological trends in order to maintain high level of expertise.Work closely with Engineering to manage/optimize routing policy and identify impact to existing commercial framework, making recommendations to the business unit based on upcoming network changes and the potential of commercial impactEvaluate prospective new business opportunities and/or acquisitions from a technical perspective, in regards to transport network, in order to improve, innovate, and adopt new technologies into usage.Be accountable for other certain works as assigned from immediate superior level.']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor or Master Degree in Electrical/Telecommunication/Computer Engineering or related field.Extensive working knowledge of network infrastructure / IPLC / CDN and Peering managementConcrete concepts in core network technologies (MPLS, BGP, ISIS, OSPF, EIGRP, etc.)Ability to analyze flow data and work with other network planning tools Good command of both written and spoken English is required. Good Teamwork and learning skill on new technology. Able to work under pressure, with problem solving capabilities. job_description: Principal Accountability:Provide technical advice and guidance regarding solution and architecture designs for ISP network with high complexity and sophistication, according to capacity plan and ISP network policies, to ensure that designs are able to support the expected usage.Provide technical advice and guidance regarding capacity planning (Infra/Peering/IPLC/CDN) and management for ensure efficiency and effectiveness of ISP network.Provide technical advice and guidance in network policy & frame work to ISP network.Provide direction and guide to the implementation team for highly complex, internet expansion, and problem management activities, which require expertise and specialization, to ensure that they are set up accurately, on a timely basis, and according to plan and design. Provide recommendation as to which ISPs, MSOs and Telcos that dtac should establish direct interconnection withUnderstand dtac current peering policy (settlement based and free), as well as that for IP Transit and the cost and revenue structure associated with each modelHave a thorough understanding of dtac existing interconnection topology Help to drive project deliverables for executing successful deployment of ISP interconnection strategy.Identify, develop and maintain healthy working relationships with peering managers at ISPs, MSOs and TelcosUpdate continuously oneself on the advanced technological trends in order to maintain high level of expertise.Work closely with Engineering to manage/optimize routing policy and identify impact to existing commercial framework, making recommendations to the business unit based on upcoming network changes and the potential of commercial impactEvaluate prospective new business opportunities and/or acquisitions from a technical perspective, in regards to transport network, in order to improve, innovate, and adopt new technologies into usage.Be accountable for other certain works as assigned from immediate superior level.Qualifications:Bachelor or Master Degree in Electrical/Telecommunication/Computer Engineering or related field.Extensive working knowledge of network infrastructure / IPLC / CDN and Peering managementConcrete concepts in core network technologies (MPLS, BGP, ISIS, OSPF, EIGRP, etc.)Ability to analyze flow data and work with other network planning tools Good command of both written and spoken English is required. Good Teamwork and learning skill on new technology. Able to work under pressure, with problem solving capabilities. How to Apply:Interested candidates are invited to submit CVwith your current photo only to"Apply Now"Only short listed candidates will be notified for further processTotal Access Communication Public Company Limited319, Recruitment Department, Chamchuri Square Building, 41 Floor, Phayathai Road, Pathumwan, Pathumwan, Bangkok Thailand. 10330

implications on existing IT systems and environmentEnsure maintenance contract is executed with vendor/supplier and periodic preventive maintenance is performed on security systemsEnsure security system uptime according to the agreed SLAMonitor and respond to IT Security threats and alerts according to formalized process and SLAAllocate appropriate budget for IT Security and ensure effective spending of the approved budgetCommunicate IT Security matters such as cyber threats, statistics and initiatives with the different levels of stakeholders including the Board and Senior ManagementCollaborate with the other IT teams to manage IT incidents which may be caused by, for example software/hardware/network failures and cyber securityEnsure IT Security system acquisition is based on formalized procurement and approval processCarry out assessment exercise with relevant parties such as Risk Management and Compliance teams to identify security risk and recommend respective mitigating controlImplement Disaster Recovery (DR) strategy for the IT Security systems in line with the overall DR strategy for the respective application systemOrganize and conduct periodic cyber drills on possible cyber-attack scenariosFollow up and report the implementation of regulations that related IT SecurityConduct Daily IT Security OperationQualification :Bachelor degree or higher in computer science, computer engineering or any related fieldAt least 3+ years’ experience in IT Security, Infrastructure securityGood understanding of security tools and technologies such as firewalls/IPS/SIEM

job_qualifications: ["s:Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT or related fields.Thai Nationality.Must be interested in database and storage technologiesMust be able to read and write in EnglishShould have some basic knowledge in database design, data structure, and file systems. It is expected that person in this position understands database normalization, data types, indexes, materialized/indexed views, and other objects in modern RDBMS or at the least willing to learn.Should be willing to experiment, with discretion.Basic knowledge in enterprise storage is a plus.Basic knowledge in enterprise backup is a plus.Basic knowledge of JDBC and Hibernate framework is a plus.Job DescriptionReview backup reports of all backup activities in the organization. If available, review the backup and/or archival results of customer’s backup schedule.Configure the backup for databases, applications, and servers deployed at customers’ sites.Monitor system performance, giving recommendations, and implement improvements to the storage and databases to enhance system response time and bandwidth.Guide and train software engineers and system analysts on the best practices of high-performance database design "]
job_description: Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT or related fields.Thai Nationality.Must be interested in database and storage technologiesMust be able to read and write in EnglishShould have some basic knowledge in database design, data structure, and file systems. It is expected that person in this position understands database normalization, data types, indexes, materialized/indexed views, and other objects in modern RDBMS or at the least willing to learn.Should be willing to experiment, with discretion.Basic knowledge in enterprise storage is a plus.Basic knowledge in enterprise backup is a plus.Basic knowledge of JDBC and Hibernate framework is a plus.Job DescriptionReview backup reports of all backup activities in the organization. If available, review the backup and/or archival results of customer’s backup schedule.Configure the backup for databases, applications, and servers deployed at customers’ sites.Monitor system performance, giving recommendations, and implement improvements to the storage and databases to enhance system response time and bandwidth.Guide and train software engineers and system analysts on the best practices of high-performance database design

We are looking for a Full Stack Developer to organise and enhance the utilisation of our primary technology stack from the ground up. The primary focus will be to augment the company’s connectivity within the technology ecosystem and to develop a back-end infrastructure for data management, through to eventual front-end delivery for Business Intelligence (BI). Accordingly, our preferred candidate will have experience and functional competency with navigating the hospitality technology stack.Due to the proprietary nature of the work you will take ownership over the company’s development of systems and technology, and as such the position will entail leadership capacities. You will conduct managerial duties that include working with senior management and spearheading various department-head responsibilities including training, recruitment, and project management.Job Description:You will be responsible for instituting a suitable end-to-end solution to service key integration points across our main technology stack.Construct back-end servers and databases for consolidation of internal and externally sourced data.Build scalable APIs, SQL schema and queries.Design practical data models for diverse data requirements and seamless front-end application.Build an internal web application to service key business processes, including a CRM and various other BI requirements.Design a practical and user-friendly front-end interface.Develop real-time data functionality to meet real-time data requirements.Optimise legacy systems; spearhead system phaseout and redundancy planning where necessary.Constantly look for opportunities to innovate and manage projects from conception through to completion.Job Requirements:3+ years of relevant experience.Thai National.Degree in Computer Science or related field.Able to communicate in English (Spoken and written).Familiarity with the hospitality and hotel technology stack is strongly preferred.Proficiency with back-end programming, including familiarity with languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, PHP and .Net.Database programming experiencing, including proficiency with SQL databases, Oracle and MongoDB, as well as experience with various data formats such as XML.Proficiency with front end languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as Angular JS, React and Amber.Interested candidates, please submit an application with complete resume together with a recent photograph, stating present and expected salary viaAPPLY NOW:Contact: Human Resources DepartmentCompass Hospitality Company Limited.Suite 10/91 Trendy Office Tower, 5th Floor10 Sukhumvit Soi 13, Bangkok 10110, ThailandTel. 662 168 7667 Ext 300Website:www.compasshospitality.com

Please note that only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interviews. "]

job_responsibilities: [" One of the leading Insurance companies is recruiting an IT professional candidate who is a data modeling expert with a strong business/commercial mindset.This person is responsible for end-to-end data modeling for both internal and external parties and leads and presents business strategies especially sales and marketing strategies from the data model to teams and stakeholders. Job DescriptionUnderstand existing data source and database structure for data analyticsPerform the data preparation for data model (data cleansing, data aggregation)Explore data from a variety of angles to help the business and answer the business' requirementsDevelop statistical models techniques/methods using base SAS, SAS Enterprise Miner, or Python to improve performance & productivity of the business (including response model, anti-churn model, cross-sell & up-sell model, win-back model)Run simulation based on model prediction, plan on Test & Learn approach, and engage relevant parties both internal & external starting from leads selection, sales execution, campaign tracking in order to ensure that Test & Learn is conducted efficiently as planSummarize and share model and/or Test & Learn results with the business recommendation to internal & external parties "]

Python is an advantageInsurance background is an advantageAble to commute and work on-site at business partner's premises BenefitsA chance to work in a dynamic and stable organizationGreat package Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy. "]
job_description: One of the leading Insurance companies is recruiting an IT professional candidate who is a data modeling expert with a strong business/commercial mindset.This person is responsible for end-to-end data modeling for both internal and external parties and leads and presents business strategies especially sales and marketing strategies from the data model to teams and stakeholders. Job DescriptionUnderstand existing data source and database structure for data analyticsPerform the data preparation for data model (data cleansing, data aggregation)Explore data from a variety of angles to help the business and answer the business' requirementsDevelop statistical models techniques/methods using base SAS, SAS Enterprise Miner, or Python to improve performance & productivity of the business (including response model, anti-churn model, cross-sell & up-sell model, win-back model)Run simulation based on model prediction, plan on Test & Learn approach, and engage relevant parties both internal & external starting from leads selection, sales execution, campaign tracking in order to ensure that Test & Learn is conducted efficiently as planSummarize and share model and/or Test & Learn results with the business recommendation to internal & external parties QualificationsBachelor degree in statistics, computer or information science, applied mathematics or engineerAt least 3 years of experience in data modeling and/or data analyticsStrong analytical thinking and problem solvingStrong interpersonal skill & able to connect people to achieve business objectivesStrong technical skills in SQL, SAS. Python is an advantageInsurance background is an advantageAble to commute and work on-site at business partner's premises BenefitsA chance to work in a dynamic and stable organizationGreat package Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

job_responsibilities: ['Tencent Thailand offers unique opportunities to grow with an industry-leading company while enjoying the benefits of creating and starting new businesses. Currently, we are looking for a highly motivatedcandidate to joinus in the role of Technical Cloud Consultant located in Bangkok, Thailand, a hub of innovation and business for Southeast Asia.Cloud is the new normal and as our customers move to the cloud, we are seeking skilled technical leaders to assist our customers with the operational challenges of cloud computing. You will work with our key customers to support their software development for cloud services, operations management, and business relationships with Tencent.As a Technical Cloud Consultant, you will play an important role in shaping and carrying out strategies to promote broad use of Tencent Cloud within organizations. You will represent Tencent within a customer’s environment, and help customers take advantage of the efficiencies and innovation available only in Tencent Cloud. You will be the operational point of contact for our customers as well as the voice of the customer within Tencent to escalate problems and drive prioritization of business needs for our customers.Responsibilities:Advocate for customers and be their voice within TencentAssist customers with the adoption of Tencent Cloud, and support migrating and building of software and services on the Tencent Cloud platformRepresent Tencent, conduct training sessions, and build deep relationships with key technical leaders within the customer’s organizationDiagnose, solve, and work with Tencent Cloud engineers to ensure customer’s technical issues are resolved quicklyResearch and participate in architectural discussions with customers to ensure solutions are designed for successful cloud deploymentsAssist customers with reviews of service disruptions, metrics, and launch planningPrepare accurate and timely reportsDocument technical knowledge in the form of notes and manualsBasic Qualifications:BE, MS degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or relevant field5+ years of software design, development, and operation experience3+ years of experience in infrastructure architecture, database architecture and networkingStrong knowledge of software development tools and methodologiesGood understanding of data modeling and architecture with the ability to quickly learn complex systems and new technologiesAble to provide technical trainingPreferred ']
job_qualifications: ['s:BE, MS degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or relevant field5+ years of software design, development, and operation experience3+ years of experience in infrastructure architecture, database architecture and networkingStrong knowledge of software development tools and methodologiesGood understanding of data modeling and architecture with the ability to quickly learn complex systems and new technologiesAble to provide technical trainingPreferred Qualifications:Experience managing cloud infrastructure or architecting cloud solutionsExperience with cyber security and disaster recoveryFamiliar with Docker and KubernetesExperience in Informational Technology operationsProfessional communication skills, with a high degree of comfort speaking with executives, IT Management, and developersExperience with network and operating systems will be a plusRecognized contributions to open source projectsExperience in a 24x7 operational services or support environment will be a plusAll applications will be treated strictly confidential. Only short-listed candidates will be notified.Tencent (Thailand) Company Limited8 T One Building, 10th, 11th and 12th Floor (Unit 4-5),Soi Sukhumvit 40, Sukhumvit Road,Phra Khanong, Khlong Toei,Bangkok 10110TEL. 02-833-3000 FAX. 02-833-3113 ']
